verses.verse: וַיְבָ֣רֶךְ <WH1288> blessed אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> And God אֶת־ <WH853> נֹ֖חַ <WH5146> Noah וְאֶת־ <WH853> בָּנָ֑יו <WH1121> and his sons וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> and said לָהֶ֛ם פְּר֥וּ <WH6509> unto them Be fruitful וּרְב֖וּ <WH7235> and multiply וּמִלְא֥וּ <WH4390> and replenish אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> the earth

וּמוֹרַאֲכֶ֤ם <WH4172> And the fear of you וְחִתְּכֶם֙ <WH2844> and the dread of you יִֽהְיֶ֔ה <WH1961> become עַ֚ל <WH5921> on כָּל־ <WH3605> every חַיַּ֣ת <WH2416> shall be upon every beast הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the earth וְעַ֖ל <WH5921> and on כָּל־ <WH3605> every ע֣וֹף <WH5775> and upon every fowl הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> of the air בְּכֹל֩ <WH3605> everything אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> that תִּרְמֹ֧שׂ <WH7430> upon all that moveth הָֽאֲדָמָ֛ה <WH127> [upon] the earth וּֽבְכָל־ <WH3605> and all דְּגֵ֥י <WH1709> and upon all the fishes הַיָּ֖ם <WH3220> of the sea בְּיֶדְכֶ֥ם <WH3027> into your hand נִתָּֽנוּ׃ <WH5414> are they delivered

כָּל־ <WH3605> Every רֶ֙מֶשׂ֙ <WH7431> Every moving thing אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after הוּא־ <WH1931> that חַ֔י <WH2416> that liveth לָכֶ֥ם יִהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> become לְאָכְלָ֑ה <WH402> shall be meat כְּיֶ֣רֶק <WH3418> for you even as the green עֵ֔שֶׂב <WH6212> herb נָתַ֥תִּי <WH5414> have I given לָכֶ֖ם אֶת־ <WH853> כֹּֽל׃ <WH3605> all
אַךְ־ <WH389> But בָּשָׂ֕ר <WH1320> flesh בְּנַפְשׁ֥וֹ <WH5315> with the life דָמ֖וֹ <WH1818> thereof [which is] the blood לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not תֹאכֵֽלוּ׃ <WH398> thereof shall ye not eat

וְאַ֨ךְ <WH389> And surely אֶת־ <WH853> דִּמְכֶ֤ם <WH1818> your blood לְנַפְשֹֽׁתֵיכֶם֙ <WH5315> of your lives אֶדְרֹ֔שׁ <WH1875> will I require מִיַּ֥ד <WH3027> at the hand כָּל־ <WH3605> every חַיָּ֖ה <WH2416> of every beast אֶדְרְשֶׁ֑נּוּ <WH1875> will I require it וּמִיַּ֣ד <WH3027> and at the hand הָֽאָדָ֗ם <WH120> of man מִיַּד֙ <WH3027> at the hand אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> of every man's אָחִ֔יו <WH251> brother אֶדְרֹ֖שׁ <WH1875> will I require אֶת־ <WH853> נֶ֥פֶשׁ <WH5315> the life הָֽאָדָֽם׃ <WH120> of man

שֹׁפֵךְ֙ <WH8210> Whoso sheddeth דַּ֣ם <WH1818> blood הָֽאָדָ֔ם <WH120> man's בָּֽאָדָ֖ם <WH120> by man דָּמ֣וֹ <WH1818> shall his blood יִשָּׁפֵ֑ךְ <WH8210> be shed כִּ֚י <WH3588> in בְּצֶ֣לֶם <WH6754> for in the image אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> made אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָדָֽם׃ <WH120> he man

וְאַתֶּ֖ם <WH859> you פְּר֣וּ <WH6509> And you be ye fruitful וּרְב֑וּ <WH7235> and multiply שִׁרְצ֥וּ <WH8317> bring forth abundantly בָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> in the earth וּרְבוּ־ <WH7235> and multiply בָֽהּ׃ ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> spake אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> And God אֶל־ <WH413> to נֹ֔חַ <WH5146> unto Noah וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to בָּנָ֥יו <WH1121> and to his sons אִתּ֖וֹ <WH854> for לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> with him saying

וַאֲנִ֕י <WH589> Myself הִנְנִ֥י <WH2005> behold מֵקִ֛ים <WH6965> And I behold I establish אֶת־ <WH853> בְּרִיתִ֖י <WH1285> my covenant אִתְּכֶ֑ם <WH854> for וְאֶֽת־ <WH854> and with זַרְעֲכֶ֖ם <WH2233> with you and with your seed אַֽחֲרֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH310> after you

וְאֵ֨ת <WH854> and with כָּל־ <WH3605> every נֶ֤פֶשׁ <WH5315> creature הַֽחַיָּה֙ <WH2416> And with every living אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after אִתְּכֶ֔ם <WH854> for בָּע֧וֹף <WH5775> that [is] with you of the fowl בַּבְּהֵמָ֛ה <WH929> of the cattle וּֽבְכָל־ <WH3605> and every חַיַּ֥ת <WH2416> and of every beast הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> of the earth אִתְּכֶ֑ם <WH854> for מִכֹּל֙ <WH3605> of all יֹצְאֵ֣י <WH3318> with you from all that go out הַתֵּבָ֔ה <WH8392> of the ark לְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> every חַיַּ֥ת <WH2416> to every beast הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the earth

וַהֲקִמֹתִ֤י <WH6965> And I will establish אֶת־ <WH853> בְּרִיתִי֙ <WH1285> my covenant אִתְּכֶ֔ם <WH854> for וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall never יִכָּרֵ֧ת <WH3772> be cut off כָּל־ <WH3605> and all בָּשָׂ֛ר <WH1320> with you neither shall all flesh ע֖וֹד <WH5750> again מִמֵּ֣י <WH4325> any more by the waters הַמַּבּ֑וּל <WH3999> of a flood וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> neither יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> shall there ע֛וֹד <WH5750> again מַבּ֖וּל <WH3999> neither shall there any more be a flood לְשַׁחֵ֥ת <WH7843> to destroy הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> the earth

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said אֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> And God זֹ֤את <WH2063> likewise אֽוֹת־ <WH226> This [is] the token הַבְּרִית֙ <WH1285> of the covenant אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which אֲנִ֣י <WH589> which I נֹתֵ֗ן <WH5414> make בֵּינִי֙ <WH996> between וּבֵ֣ינֵיכֶ֔ם <WH996> between וּבֵ֛ין <WH996> between כָּל־ <WH3605> and every נֶ֥פֶשׁ <WH5315> creature חַיָּ֖ה <WH2416> between me and you and every living אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which אִתְּכֶ֑ם <WH854> for לְדֹרֹ֖ת <WH1755> generations עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> that [is] with you for perpetual

אֶת־ <WH853> קַשְׁתִּ֕י <WH7198> my bow נָתַ֖תִּי <WH5414> I do set בֶּֽעָנָ֑ן <WH6051> in the cloud וְהָֽיְתָה֙ <WH1961> shall be for לְא֣וֹת <WH226> and it shall be for a token בְּרִ֔ית <WH1285> of a covenant בֵּינִ֖י <WH996> between וּבֵ֥ין <WH996> between הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> between me and the earth

וְהָיָ֕ה <WH1961> shall come בְּעַֽנְנִ֥י <WH6049> And it shall come to pass when I bring עָנָ֖ן <WH6051> a cloud עַל־ <WH5921> over הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> over the earth וְנִרְאֲתָ֥ה <WH7200> shall be seen הַקֶּ֖שֶׁת <WH7198> that the bow בֶּעָנָֽן׃ <WH6051> in the cloud

וְזָכַרְתִּ֣י <WH2142> And I will remember אֶת־ <WH853> בְּרִיתִ֗י <WH1285> my covenant אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which בֵּינִי֙ <WH996> is between וּבֵ֣ינֵיכֶ֔ם <WH996> is between וּבֵ֛ין <WH996> is between כָּל־ <WH3605> and every נֶ֥פֶשׁ <WH5315> creature חַיָּ֖ה <WH2416> which [is] between me and you and every living בְּכָל־ <WH3605> of all בָּשָׂ֑ר <WH1320> of all flesh וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> and never יִֽהְיֶ֨ה <WH1961> become ע֤וֹד <WH5750> shall no more הַמַּ֙יִם֙ <WH4325> and the waters לְמַבּ֔וּל <WH3999> become a flood לְשַׁחֵ֖ת <WH7843> to destroy כָּל־ <WH3605> all בָּשָֽׂר׃ <WH1320> all flesh

וְהָיְתָ֥ה <WH1961> become הַקֶּ֖שֶׁת <WH7198> And the bow בֶּֽעָנָ֑ן <WH6051> shall be in the cloud וּרְאִיתִ֗יהָ <WH7200> and I will look upon it לִזְכֹּר֙ <WH2142> that I may remember בְּרִ֣ית <WH1285> covenant עוֹלָ֔ם <WH5769> the everlasting בֵּ֣ין <WH996> between אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> God וּבֵין֙ <WH996> and כָּל־ <WH3605> and every נֶ֣פֶשׁ <WH5315> creature חַיָּ֔ה <WH2416> every living בְּכָל־ <WH3605> of all בָּשָׂ֖ר <WH1320> of all flesh אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> that עַל־ <WH5921> is on הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> that [is] upon the earth

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> And God אֶל־ <WH413> to נֹ֑חַ <WH5146> unto Noah זֹ֤את <WH2063> likewise אֽוֹת־ <WH226> This [is] the token הַבְּרִית֙ <WH1285> of the covenant אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which הֲקִמֹ֔תִי <WH6965> which I have established בֵּינִ֕י <WH996> between וּבֵ֥ין <WH996> between כָּל־ <WH3605> and all בָּשָׂ֖ר <WH1320> between me and all flesh אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> is on הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> that [is] upon the earth פ

וַיִּֽהְי֣וּ <WH1961> become בְנֵי־ <WH1121> And the sons נֹ֗חַ <WH5146> of Noah הַיֹּֽצְאִים֙ <WH3318> that went forth מִן־ <WH4480> out הַתֵּבָ֔ה <WH8392> of the ark שֵׁ֖ם <WH8035> were Shem וְחָ֣ם <WH2526> and Ham וָיָ֑פֶת <WH3315> and Japheth וְחָ֕ם <WH2526> and Ham ה֖וּא <WH1931> he אֲבִ֥י <WH1> [is] the father כְנָֽעַן׃ <WH3667> of Canaan

שְׁלֹשָׁ֥ה <WH7969> These [are] the three אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> These בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> sons נֹ֑חַ <WH5146> of Noah וּמֵאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> these נָֽפְצָ֥ה <WH5310> overspread כָל־ <WH3605> the whole הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> and of them was the whole earth
וַיָּ֥חֶל <WH2490> began נֹ֖חַ <WH5146> And Noah אִ֣ישׁ <WH582> another הָֽאֲדָמָ֑ה <WH127> land וַיִּטַּ֖ע <WH5193> and he planted כָּֽרֶם׃ <WH3754> a vineyard

וַיֵּ֥שְׁתְּ <WH8354> And he drank מִן־ <WH4480> at הַיַּ֖יִן <WH3196> of the wine וַיִּשְׁכָּ֑ר <WH7937> and was drunken וַיִּתְגַּ֖ל <WH1540> and he was uncovered בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> within אָהֳלֹֽה׃ <WH168> his tent

וַיַּ֗רְא <WH7200> saw חָ֚ם <WH2526> And Ham אֲבִ֣י <WH1> the father כְנַ֔עַן <WH3667> of Canaan אֵ֖ת <WH853> עֶרְוַ֣ת <WH6172> the nakedness אָבִ֑יו <WH1> of his father וַיַּגֵּ֥ד <WH5046> and told לִשְׁנֵֽי־ <WH8147> his two אֶחָ֖יו <WH251> brethren בַּחֽוּץ׃ <WH2351> without

וַיִּקַּח֩ <WH3947> took שֵׁ֨ם <WH8035> And Shem וָיֶ֜פֶת <WH3315> and Japheth אֶת־ <WH853> הַשִּׂמְלָ֗ה <WH8071> a garment וַיָּשִׂ֙ימוּ֙ <WH7760> and laid עַל־ <WH5921> and שְׁכֶ֣ם <WH7926> their shoulders שְׁנֵיהֶ֔ם <WH8147> [it] upon both וַיֵּֽלְכוּ֙ <WH1980> and walked אֲחֹ֣רַנִּ֔ית <WH322> backward וַיְכַסּ֕וּ <WH3680> and covered אֵ֖ת <WH853> עֶרְוַ֣ת <WH6172> the nakedness אֲבִיהֶ֑ם <WH1> of their father וּפְנֵיהֶם֙ <WH6440> and their faces אֲחֹ֣רַנִּ֔ית <WH322> [were] backward וְעֶרְוַ֥ת <WH6172> nakedness אֲבִיהֶ֖ם <WH1> not their father's לֹ֥א <WH3808> did not רָאֽוּ׃ <WH7200> and they saw

וַיִּ֥יקֶץ <WH3364> awoke נֹ֖חַ <WH5146> And Noah מִיֵּינ֑וֹ <WH3196> from his wine וַיֵּ֕דַע <WH3045> and knew אֵ֛ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> what עָ֥שָׂה־ <WH6213> had done ל֖וֹ בְּנ֥וֹ <WH1121> son הַקָּטָֽן׃ <WH6996> what his younger

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> And he said אָר֣וּר <WH779> Cursed כְּנָ֑עַן <WH3667> [be] Canaan עֶ֥בֶד <WH5650> a servant עֲבָדִ֖ים <WH5650> of servants יִֽהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> shall be to לְאֶחָֽיו׃ <WH251> shall he be unto his brethren

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> And he said בָּר֥וּךְ <WH1288> Blessed יְהֹוָ֖ה <WH3068> [be] the LORD אֱלֹ֣הֵי <WH430> God שֵׁ֑ם <WH8035> of Shem וִיהִ֥י <WH1961> shall be כְנַ֖עַן <WH3667> and Canaan עֶ֥בֶד <WH5650> his servant לָֽמוֹ׃ <WH3926> at

יַ֤פְתְּ <WH6601> shall enlarge אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> God לְיֶ֔פֶת <WH3315> Japheth וְיִשְׁכֹּ֖ן <WH7931> and he shall dwell בְּאָֽהֳלֵי־ <WH168> in the tents שֵׁ֑ם <WH8035> of Shem וִיהִ֥י <WH1961> become כְנַ֖עַן <WH3667> and Canaan עֶ֥בֶד <WH5650> shall be his servant לָֽמוֹ׃ <WH3926> at

וַֽיְחִי־ <WH2421> lived נֹ֖חַ <WH5146> And Noah אַחַ֣ר <WH310> after הַמַּבּ֑וּל <WH3999> the flood שְׁלֹ֤שׁ <WH7969> three מֵאוֹת֙ <WH3967> hundred שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> years וַֽחֲמִשִּׁ֖ים <WH2572> and fifty שָׁנָֽה׃ <WH8141> years

וַיִּֽהְיוּ֙ <WH1961> become כָּל־ <WH3605> all יְמֵי־ <WH3117> And all the days נֹ֔חַ <WH5146> of Noah תְּשַׁ֤ע <WH8672> were nine מֵאוֹת֙ <WH3967> hundred שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> years וַחֲמִשִּׁ֖ים <WH2572> and fifty שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> years וַיָּמֹֽת׃ <WH4191> and he died פ
